title: 📊 Market Intel — 12:05 PM
content:
# 📊 Market Intel Report
**Thursday, February 19th, 2026 — 12:04 PM ET**

**Top 5 Trending:** Fed official slams crypto as "utterly useless" | Klarna crashes on earnings miss | Gemini 3.1 Pro launches | Cooper Flagg's NBA jersey sells for $1M | Crypto markets bleed red across the board

---

## 🔥 TOP TRENDING

- **Fed's Kashkari goes nuclear on crypto**: Minneapolis Fed president calls crypto "utterly useless" and dismisses stablecoins as "buzzword salad" — brutal institutional takedown (CoinDesk)
- **Klarna's brutal public market debut**: Stock plummeting on worst trading day since IPO after missing analyst expectations (Yahoo Finance)
- **Kalshi gets institutional**: Prediction market platform signs deal with Tradeweb Markets, bringing prediction markets to institutional investors — Fed research paper praises platforms like Kalshi as "valuable to policymakers" (CoinDesk, Yahoo)
- **Cooper Flagg's jersey hits $1M**: Mavericks debut jersey sells for seven figures — rookie hype is real (ESPN)
- **Gemini 3.1 Pro drops**: Google DeepMind's latest model launches (170 points on HN)

---

## 📈 STOCK MOVERS

### Winners
- **None identified** — market appears broadly negative today

### Losers
- **Klarna (KLAR)**: Worst trading day since IPO debut, missing earnings guidance badly
- **Bitdeer (BTDR)**: Down 17% on $300M convertible note offering, dilution fears hit bitcoin miner hard

### Notable Activity
- **Tradeweb Markets (TW)**: Signed deal with Kalshi to bring prediction markets to institutional investors
- **Herbalife (HLF)**: Cristiano Ronaldo investing $7.5M in digital wellness platform for 10% stake

---

## 💰 CRYPTO & DIGITAL ASSETS

**Broad selloff across crypto:**
- **Bitcoin**: $66,258 (-1.34%) — RSI crashed below 30 for third time ever, signaling "long, slow grind" ahead, potentially consolidating around $60K for months
- **Ethereum**: $1,921 (-2.72%)
- **XRP**: $1.39 (-4.62%)
- **Solana**: $80.74 (-1.88%)
- **BNB**: $600 (-2.66%)

### Key Stories
- **UAE bitcoin mining profits**: Royal family-linked mining rigs sitting on $344M unrealized profit, producing ~4 BTC/day — state-backed infrastructure turning into "sovereign bitcoin machine" (CoinDesk)
- **SocGen expands euro stablecoin**: French banking giant taps XRP Ledger for distribution, third blockchain for institutional use (CoinDesk)
- **Mike McGlone softens BTC bearish call**: After backlash over $10K target, now calling for $28K downside scenario (CoinDesk)
- **Ledn raises $188M**: First bitcoin-backed bond sale in asset-backed securities market, packaging 5,400+ BTC collateralized loans (CoinDesk)
- **ETF flows**: Bitcoin, Ether, XRP ETFs bleeding while Solana bucks outflow trend — "selective institutional rotation" not full retreat

### DeFi & Infrastructure
- **Robinhood building L2**: Testnet logs 4M transactions, pushing ahead with own blockchain infra even as Vitalik Buterin cools on Ethereum rollup roadmap (CoinDesk)
- **Figure debuts tokenized stock**: $FGRD token represents common shares issued natively onchain with instant settlement + built-in lending (CoinDesk)
- **Trump hotel tokenization**: World Liberty taps BlackRock-backed Securitize to structure/tokenize loan revenue tied to Maldives resort project (CoinDesk)

### Regulatory / Macro
- **Fed research praises prediction markets**: Deep look at Kalshi platforms called "valuable to policymakers and researchers" (CoinDesk)
- **Stablecoin illicit flows remain <1%**: $141B of $35T total stablecoin volume in 2025 was illicit, 86% sanctions-related (TRM Labs report via CoinDesk)
- **77% of stablecoin users would open bank wallet**: YouGov survey shows strong demand for bank-issued stablecoin wallets and debit cards (Coinbase/BVNK via CoinDesk)

---

3. **Pebble Production: February Update** — smartwatch production news (160 points, 61 comments)  
   https://repebble.com/blog/february-pebble-production-and-software-updates

4. **Show HN: Micasa – track your house from the terminal** — SQLite-based home tracking tool built with AI (25 points, 11 comments)  
   https://micasa.dev

5. **AI made coding more enjoyable** — developer sentiment piece (37 points, 25 comments)  
   https://weberdominik.com/blog/ai-coding-enjoyable/

## 💻 AI & TECH

- **Gemini 3.1 Pro launches**: Google DeepMind's latest model drops, big discussion on HN (170 points)

- **AI coding sentiment**: Developer post "AI made coding more enjoyable" trending on HN (37 points)
- **"Don't Trust the Salt" paper**: AI summarization, multilingual safety, and LLM guardrails discussion on HN (138 points)

---

## 🏈 SPORTS & BETTING

### Olympics
- **USA vs. Canada women's hockey gold medal match** — the rematch everyone was waiting for (ESPN)
- **Figure skater Alysa Liu** — looking to snap 20-year U.S. gold drought
- **Sidney Crosby status uncertain** — Canada coach says "by no means out," going day-to-day

### NBA
- **Cooper Flagg's Mavericks debut jersey**: Sold for $1 million (ESPN)
- **LaMelo Ball car crash**: Hornets guard uninjured after accident in Charlotte (ESPN)
- **NBA second half starts now**: Lakers/Bucks/Warriors offseason questions loom large

### NCAA Basketball
- **Kansas' Darryn Peterson**: Cramping exit draws concern from coach Bill Self (ESPN)
- **Creighton upsets #5 UConn**: Player stars after mother's death (ESPN)
- **Auburn bubble trouble**: Fifth straight loss, sliding in Bubble Watch rankings

### MLB
- **Spring training begins Friday** (ESPN)
- **MLBPA leadership change**: Bruce Meyer elevated to executive director after Tony Clark resignation (ESPN)
